forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 20C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 68F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 15C. E winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 61F. E winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
